Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2023...
Traded from Brooklyn to Detroit on 3/2/2023 (Going to BRO: 2B Xavier Lamere. Going to DET: C Clyde Roberts)...
Traded from Detroit to Cincinnati on 7/30/2023 (Going to DET: 1B Jason Domingo, P Shannon Fulton. Going to CIN: C Clyde Roberts, P Thurman Brawley)...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 2/21/2025 (Going to STL: C Clyde Roberts. Going to CIN: CF Yonehiko Kafu)...
Injured on 6/21/2025 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/21/2026, off Jeronimo Reinoso (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/25/2026, off Zachary Pietrzak (ATL)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2027...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 3/2/2031 (Going to CIN: RF George Levy, C Clyde Roberts. Going to STL: SS James Webb, 2B Rosendo Solorzano, P Scott McCoy, P Agustin Muñoz)...
1/31/2032: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
